articles.content: Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s first web series, Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar,is all set to start streaming on Netflix from Wednesday. At the Los Angeles premiere of the big-budget show, Bhansali spoke ab… [+2098 chars]

articles.author: Riya Sharma
articles.title: Meet actor, who once competed with Ranbir Kapoor, signed 12 films after one hit; then quit films after - DNA India
articles.description: This star kid, who once competed with Ranbir Kapoor, later quit films after back-to-back flops.
